title: Clinical Practical Skills Enhancement: UN PRME-Influenced Sustainability Principles Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the 17 UN SDGs (Sustainable Development Goals) in connection with mathematical data analysis tools.
Learners can construct system dynamics models to address sustainability issues and interpret simulation results.
Learners can design and present math-based sustainability solutions applicable to community problems through team-based projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
